description: Eko Land Produce is an eco-friendly export company based in Sri Lanka, specializing in organically grown spices such as pepper, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Founded during the pandemic, it aims to support local farmers by ensuring fair prices and sustainable practices. The initiative emphasizes environmental protection and community welfare, while also promoting agri-tourism. By integrating organic farming with eco-tourism, Eko Land seeks to showcase Sri Lanka's potential for high-quality spice production and foster a responsible supply chain.
name: Eko Land
